Translations.Text: Those proklam Our Lord est DI tiam plumb righteous life angxel descend them Vi ne hav tim nor shall vi grieve Gxoj bon news Paradise hav rezerv vi
Ni est your allies en this life Hereafter Vi hav gxi anything vi wish vi hav anything vi want
(Such est your) ultimate abode el Forgiver Merciful
Who utter put vort than unu invit DI works righteousness dir mi est 1 de submitters
Ne egal est bon response mav response. Vi resort nicest possible response. Tiel unu uz est your enemy maj igx your put amik
Neniom ating this those steadfastly persevere Neniom ating this those est extremely fortunate
When diabl flustr ide vi vi streb rifugx DI. Li est Hearer Omniscient
Among His proofs est nokt tag sun lun. Ne prostrate sun nor lun; vi fal prostrate DI kre them vi ver worship Him sol
Ili est tro arrogant do this tiam those your Lord glor Him nokt tag sen ever lac
